# init(upstream:)

**Initializer**

Creates a connectable publisher, attached to the provide upstream publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
init(upstream: Upstream)
```

## Parameters

- **upstream**: The publisher from which to receive elements.
title: init(upstream:)
